DataElement.preferredDefinition: A question which asks if the diagnosis has been confirmed.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A domain that represents the data that uniquely identifies tumors._The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation._Having been established or verified.
